description: Welcome to George Townhomes by Marcon! Located in the heart of Moody Centre, one of Port Moodyâ€™s most sought-after neighbourhoods. This quality-built 4 bed, 3.5 bath home offers over 1,300 sq ft of efficient living space overlooking lush trees and a peaceful creek. The entry level features a bright bedroom and full bath, ideal for guests or a home office. The main floor offers a functional open layout with separate kitchen, dining, and living areas plus a balcony with gas hookup. Upstairs includes 3 bedrooms and laundry, with the primary suite boasting heated floors and a custom built-in walk-in closet. Enjoy year-round comfort with a strata-approved heat pump, just minutes from transit, schools, parks, and shopping.
